thread.title: ‘Just suddenly wake up?’ Samantha Power’s ‘total lack of self-awareness’ is stunning
thread.title_full: ‘Just suddenly wake up?’ Samantha Power’s ‘total lack of self-awareness’ is stunning

author: Doug P.
title: ‘Just suddenly wake up?’ Samantha Power’s ‘total lack of self-awareness’ is stunning
text:
— Erick Brockway (@erickbrockway) March 22, 2017 ISIS buried hundreds of women & children in mass graves and there are still so many horrors to find because we barely tried to stop it 
— Stephen Miller (@redsteeze) March 22, 2017 2011-2016: bystanders to the world. 
2017: Let me tell you of these great horrors with my twitter account 
— Stephen Miller (@redsteeze) March 22, 2017 @SamanthaJPower What exactly did you do for 3 years? 
— Stephen Miller (@redsteeze) March 22, 2017 Total lack of self awareness https://t.co/rzao0ujtco 
— Comfortably Smug (@ComfortablySmug) March 22, 2017 Remember your former boss pulling out of Iraq & not enforcing the so called 'red line' in Syria, all to appease Russia & Iran? Good times. https://t.co/xVAifQbwNU 
— Harry Merickel (@MNMerickel) March 22, 2017 @SamanthaJPower did you just suddenly wake up from an 8 year alcohol induced sleep?! 
— Ally Chat😼🍷 (@AllyGeighter) March 22, 2017 @SamanthaJPower Do you own a mirror? #askingforafriend 
— J. P. Orréaga ♧ (@DrAlfredBellows) March 22, 2017 @SamanthaJPower have you lost your mind? 
— Rebel in PHX 🇺🇸 (@Rebel_Mike) March 22, 2017 @SamanthaJPower yeah they must be unearthed because they were hidden for 6 years pic.twitter.com/FCwANnYbCg 
— The Right Wing M (@TheRightWingM) March 22, 2017 Featured: Person startled that the chaos and war they caused resulted in chaos, death, and war. https://t.co/dcFRKb6NKu 
— Warlord Ralts (@Warlord_Ralts) March 22, 2017 
Maybe Power was preoccupied with Broadway musicals and has just had a chance to catch up on the news.
